p: The extracts (50 µL) were mixed with the solution (150 µL of ethanol, 10 µL of 1M Sodium acetate (NaOAc) and 10 µL of Aluminum Chloride (AlCl 3)). The mixture was incubated in the dark at RT for 40 min and measured at 415 nm. Quercetin was used as the standard. The content of flavonoid was in Quercetin equivalent (QE) mg/g of dry weight.
